column3: Latest;Battambang: According to posts and a video on Facebook
column4: 3 baby crocodiles were caught on the banks of the Stung Sanke in Battambang town at 5 pm on June 22.------In May
column5: larger crocodiles were ------caught in the same river
column6: ------ with the unusual presence giving rise to several theories
column7: including a breakout from a local farm.------How theses small specimens got into the water is also unclear. They could have escaped from a hatchery
column8: been released as a prank or even have come from eggs laid in the wild by undiscovered crocodiles. Or the whole story could be a hoax.
